ygData.subject: RE: harm touch, and finally quests!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Care to share what yuou did to get the dead to like you? I will do whatever I have to do to get this faction up but I am at a loss now. virten
ygData.messageBody:
> as far as faction.. i am a human sk, and i am now considered kindly by the
> lodge of the dead. recently it seems the default human sk faction with the
> lodge was either lowered, or the people who have trouble spent
> too much time
> hunting in befallen (which i have heard has a peripheral effect
> on lodge of
> the dead fac).

Care to share what yuou did to get the dead to like you? I will do whatever
I have to do to get this faction up but I am at a loss now.

virten
